activities: EU customers and prospects may complete web registration forms in order to participate in web seminars or download whitepapers. Customers and prospects may opt out of receiving follow-up email. If a customer submits their database for troubleshooting by technical support, the database is first evaluated within the EU in our Switzerland call center. Occasionally ,customer databases must be transferred from the EU to the USA for further analysis. PeopleCube takes appropriate caution to protect the database and its contents while in electronic transit (FTP).
eucountries: France, Germany, Ireland, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech: European Data Protection Authority and the Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner for Switzerland.
